name: REBECCA vs GAIA
description:
My sworn enemy Angelo Giuriato challenged me to a fight, so we nominated champions to slug it out. 

In the purple corner: REBECCA - stout of heart, lithe of soul, Angelo’s champion is a writhing interloper, full of purple, made of lips and wax. She plays the warrior role here, but her motivations are spiteful and galactic. 

In the blue and green corner: GAIA, AKA ‘EARTH’, recently washed clean of the blood of her son/lover Ouranos thanks to the sickle-castration from their son Chronos (don’t ask). She is wreathed around her equator by the song of Hesiod, relayed by the nine Helikonian Muses. She has a womb full of fifty-headed sons.

Who will win? The fate of the universe is at stake.

Or maybe it’s just a sexy little dance.

“Open maw, I took the drops of blood that came, 
and as four seasons did recur, 
in glee, in shame I bore the Furies 
with their rage and spittle. 
Next the Giants 
with immense, enraptured spleens. 
And all from the iron sickle’s sleeve.”

Bespoke jewellery, mother-goddess tattoos, hard-as-nails sportswear and shiny Gaia courtesy of Wily Guys [ @guyswily  ]
Tentacular shiny alien, lips, lights and bespoke high-fashion courtesy of Angelo Giuriato [ @angelocreates  ]

(Digital sculpture/digital painting - 10496 x 6294px) 

[ T : @guyswily / W : wilyguys.com / I : @wilyguys / M : wilyguys.medium.com ]
